Package com.mimecast.robin.config.server

Class UsersConfig

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.ConfigFoundation
com.mimecast.robin.config.BasicConfig
com.mimecast.robin.config.server.UsersConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UsersConfig extends BasicConfig
Users configuration.

This class provides type safe access to user authentication configuration.

Contains a list of users and a flag to enable/disable the user list.

User list is ignored if Dovecot authentication is enabled.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • isListEnabled

      public boolean isListEnabled()
      Checks if user list is enabled.

      This feature should be used for testing only.

      This is disabled by default for security reasons.

      Returns:
      true if user list is enabled, false otherwise.

    • getList
